import React, { useState } from 'react' function Update() { const {id} = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8081/read/'+id) .then(res => { console.log(res) setProduct(res.data[0]); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) const [values, setValues ] = useState({ name: product.productName, price: product.price, description: product.description, type: product.productType, image: product.productImage }) return (

Update food

) } export default Update
